children.text: The quirk margins on these architraves are not consistent, which looks poorly finished.
The Victorian Building Authority’s Guide to Standards and Tolerances clause 10.03 Architrave quirks states
‘The width of the quirk (setback from the edge) of each length of an architrave is defective if it is not consistent and where the irregularity can be seen from a normal viewing position’ .
These architraves will need to be removed and reconstructed in accordance with above.
